data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Mary, Turkmenistan humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mary, Turkmenistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,648 believers in the state of Mary the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Mary, Turkmenistan that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Pour your Spirit out on the 1,480,400 citizens of Mary, Turkmenistan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Baloch, Western people might believe through him.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Mary.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Mary prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Mary access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
